customer_addr:
55 B GOODWIN DRIVE, SUITE 102
MERRITT ISLAND, FL 32952

citations.narrative:
There were two open bags of animal bedding on the floor during the inspection. These bags need to be stored in a
manner which protects it from contamination by spillage or vermin. . Supplies of food and bedding shall be stored in
facilities which adequately protect such supplies against deterioration, molding, or contamination by vermin.
Correct by: 10-10-2021.

There were two light fixtures that were above the mammal area that were not working at time of this inspection. These
need to be repaired or replaced to permit routine inspection and cleaning. Indoor housing facilities shall have ample
lighting, by natural or artificial means, or both, of good quality, distribution, and duration as appropriate for the species
involved. Such lighting shall be uniformly distributed and of sufficient intensity to permit routine inspection and cleaning.
Correct by: 10-10-2021.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the manager.
End Section

narrative:
3.125(c) 
   
Facilities, general. 
There were two open bags of animal bedding on the floor during the inspection.  These bags need to be stored in a 
manner which protects it from contamination by spillage or vermin.  . Supplies of food and bedding shall be stored in 
facilities which adequately protect such supplies against deterioration, molding, or contamination by vermin. 
 
Correct by:  10-10-2021. 
3.126(c) 
   
Facilities, indoor. 
There were two light fixtures that were above the mammal area that were not working at time of this inspection.  These 
need to be repaired or replaced to permit routine inspection and cleaning.  Indoor housing facilities shall have ample 
lighting, by natural or artificial means, or both, of good quality, distribution, and duration as appropriate for the species 
involved. Such lighting shall be uniformly distributed and of sufficient intensity to permit routine inspection and cleaning. 
 
Correct by:  10-10-2021. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the manager.

End Section
